bug.short_desc: Evaluate if (some) meta tags from index.html can be added dynamically

long_desc.thetext:
In the index.html some meta tags are added in the <head> section. Some projects, using an old version of index.html, might miss changes in the index.html.
Right now the following meta tags are used:
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width; initial-scale=1.0; maximum-scale=1.0; user-scalable=0;" /> <meta name="apple-mobile-web-app-capable" content="yes" /> <meta names="apple-mobile-web-app-status-bar-style" content="black-translucent" /> <meta name="format-detection" content="telephone=no">
Evaluate if (some) meta tags from index.html can be added dynamically via JavaScript.
Also check/add:
<meta name="format-detection" content="address=no"/>
